channel.title: Macro on 非同期エンジニアブログ
channel.description: Recent content in Macro on 非同期エンジニアブログ

item.title: On Rust
item.description: On Rust $ cargo install cargo-expand macro_rules! hello { () => { println!("hello, world"); }; } fn main() { hello!(); } $ cargo expand main fn main() { { ::std::io::_print(::core::fmt::Arguments::new_v1(&["hello, world\n"], &[])); }; } macro_rules! pass { () => {}; } fn main() { pass!(); } $ cargo expand main fn main() {}
